name: No Turning Back (Yazorius)
description:
(English only)
Please, change your screen resolution to 1920x1080 max.

Each gamejam has its own set of weird projects. Players, streamers and testers, eager to discover independent productions full of ideas and creative energy, install and play programs that are unknown, even if it could ... open a direct conversation with a hacker in the middle of the Darkweb without any security.

Will you dare to play it? To play or not is the first direct choice here, proving that the game has already begun, insidiously, following the reading of this text. Just like the flapping of a butterfly's wing. Will you succeed to reach the end ? I'll find out soon... We'll all  find out ...

And don't forget : There is NO-TURNING-BACK !

#MadewithFusion
